name: Social Distance
description: Distance ... the thing that prevents us from danger ... danger arises in the absence of distance, and a person who is not familiar with boundaries can be a good prey for anything that destroys him. In the tumult of our unfinished daily lives, we had forgotten the blessings of distance, and the corona became a gift to remind us again that distance is one of the factors that contributes to survival. Corona is the most trivial factor among the thousands of diseases that afflict human beings in society, but because their appearance is so calm which becomes part of human existence, no one seeks to cure them.
